rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

res.rBody:
Dixit Judas
Simoni fratri suo fratribus suis elige tibi viros et vade libera fratres tuos
in Galilaeam in Galilaea ego autem et Jonathas
frater meus frater tuus ibimus
in Galaditidin in Galaditim in Galaditin in Galadithim in Galadithin in Galathithin sicut fuerit voluntas
in caelo in caelum
sic fiat sic fiet

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F Hyd

verses.vBody:
Et nunc clamemus in caelum et miserebitur nostri
deus noster deus
silent witness
Accingimini et estote filii potentes Accingimini filii potentes et estote parati quoniam melius nobis mori in bello quam videre mala gentis nostrae et sanctorum

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd
